name: Decay: Paper (Kindred Community Jam 2020)
description:
Decay: Paper is about a paper world in which the Elder Trees are decaying! Save them by dashing through the levels and casting your soul into the chaos to break and collect fragments of it.

The fragments then can be used to infuse the tree with the help of the Guardian and replenish the Elder Trees!

(This game is not in its presentable form as I had fever, hence did not have the energy to polish it before Kindred Community Jam 2020 deadline).

Made by Sadeem Sajid (Frostblood Games). Solo Development.
